ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = 'Person Account' && ( CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'admin@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'default@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'email@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'feedback@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'info@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'mail@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'marketing@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'news@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'newsletter@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'ops@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'orders@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'press@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'pressrelease@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'sales@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'security@') || CONTAINS( PersonEmail , 'support@') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address not containing the following admin@, default@, email@, feedback@, info@, mail@, marketing@, news@, newsletter@, ops@, orders@, press@, pressrelease@, sales@, security@, support@
